type: Legendary Creature – Human Mercenary Lord Demigod
rules_text:
Trample
[i]Greil Army[/i] – Other creatures you control get +2/+2.
[i]Great Aether[/i] – Whenever Ike, Supreme Commander becomes blocked, he gains lifelink and gets +X/+0 where X is the greatest power among creatures blocking him.
Partner with Micaiah, Queen of Daein [i](When this creature enters, target player may put Micaiah into their hand from their library, then shuffle.)[/i]
